prompts: Create a majestic fire-type Pokemon known for its agility and fiery mane.
Imagine a Pokemon resembling a dog, with bright orange fur and black stripes.
Show me a powerful Pokemon that embodies loyalty and strength in battle.
Generate a creature that roams the grasslands, blending seamlessly with its fiery colors.
Design a Pokemon with fierce eyes and a commanding presence, perfect for trainers.
Make a fire-type Pokemon that stands out with a unique flame pattern on its body.
Give me an image of a brave Pokemon that symbolizes courage and determination.
